rev.diff:
Line 139: Line 139:
==April Fool's Day jokes==
==April Fool's Day jokes==
  +
''Main article: [[Google's hoaxes]]''
  +
Google has a tradition of creating [[April Fool's Day]] jokes such as '''Google MentalPlex''' which featured the use on mental power to search the web. In [[2002]] they claimed that [[pigeons]] were the secret behind the growing [[search engine]]. In [[2004]] it featured '''Google Lunar''' which featured jobs on the [[moon]] and in [[2005]] a [[fiction|fictitious]] drink termed '''[[Google Gulp]]''' was announced.
Google has a tradition of creating [[April Fool's Day]] jokes such as '''Google MentalPlex''' which featured the use on mental power to search the web. In [[2002]] they claimed that [[pigeons]] were the secret behind the growing [[search engine]]. In [[2004]] it featured '''Google Lunar''' which featured jobs on the [[moon]] and in [[2005]] a [[fiction|fictitious]] drink termed '''[[Google Gulp]]''' was announced.
